name: Death Runner (Dead Soul Studio)
description:
Ready to have an epic experience with Death Runner?

Death Runner is endless fast-based game made for ScoreSpace

this game was made in 5 days for the jam SO EXPECT MORE UPDATES FOR THE GAME SOON (ofc if you guys liked it :")

Dont forget to give me your feed back guys and your highscore if you liked the game <3

HOW TO PLAY:

wsad (xAxis)- for movement

space (A)- for jump

right mouse click (RB) - use grappler

left ctrl (B) - slide

if you guys enjoyed the game dont forgot to support me <3
